named-query.name: CsAIndirizzo.getListaComuni
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT ind.csAAnaIndirizzo.comCod, ind.csAAnaIndirizzo.comDes FROM CsAIndirizzo ind WHERE ind.csTbTipoIndirizzo.id= :tipo AND NVL(IND.dataFineApp, TO_DATE('31/12/9999','dd/MM/yyyy')) > SYSDATE AND ind.csAAnaIndirizzo.comCod IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ind.csAAnaIndirizzo.comDes

named-query.name: CsAIndirizzo.getListaNazioni

named-query.name: CsItStepLAZY.getIterStepLAZYListByCaso
named-query.query: select its from CsItStepLAZY its left join fetch its.csOOperatore1 left join fetch its.csOOperatore2 left join fetch its.csCfgItStato left join fetch its.csOSettore1 inner join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione1 inner join fetch its.csOSettore1 left join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione2 left join fetch its.csOSettore2 left join fetch its.csDDiario where its.csACasoId = :csACasoId order by its.id desc

named-query.name: CsItStep.getLastIterStepByCaso
named-query.query: select its from CsItStep its left join fetch its.csOOperatore1 left join fetch its.csOOperatore2 left join fetch its.csCfgItStato left join fetch its.csDDiario where its.csACaso.id = :idCaso and its.id = (select max(its2.id) from CsItStep its2 where its.csACaso.id=its2.csACaso.id)

named-query.name: CsItStep.getFirstIterStepByCaso
named-query.query: select its from CsItStep its left join fetch its.csOOperatore1 left join fetch its.csOOperatore2 where its.csACaso.id = :idCaso and its.id = (select min(its2.id) from CsItStep its2 where its.csACaso.id=its2.csACaso.id)

named-query.name: CsItStepLAZY.getLastIterStepLAZYByCaso
named-query.query: select its from CsItStepLAZY its left join fetch its.csOOperatore1 o1 left join fetch its.csOOperatore2 o2 left join fetch its.csCfgItStato left join fetch its.csOSettore1 inner join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione1 inner join fetch its.csOSettore1 left join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione2 left join fetch its.csOSettore2 left join fetch its.csDDiario left join fetch o1.csOOperatoreAnagrafica left join fetch o2.csOOperatoreAnagrafica where its.csACasoId = :idCaso and its.id = (select max(its2.id) from CsItStepLAZY its2 where its.csACasoId=its2.csACasoId)

named-query.name: CsItStepLAZY.getLastIterStepLAZYByTipoCaso
named-query.query: select its from CsItStepLAZY its left join fetch its.csOOperatore1 o1 left join fetch its.csOOperatore2 o2 left join fetch its.csCfgItStato left join fetch its.csOSettore1 inner join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione1 inner join fetch its.csOSettore1 left join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione2 left join fetch its.csOSettore2 left join fetch its.csDDiario left join fetch o1.csOOperatoreAnagrafica left join fetch o2.csOOperatoreAnagrafica where its.csACasoId = :idCaso and its.id = (select max(its2.id) from CsItStepLAZY its2 where its.csACasoId=its2.csACasoId and its2.csCfgItStato.id = :idStato )

named-query.name: CsCfgItTransizione.findTransizionesByStatoRuolo
named-query.query: select itt from CsCfgItRuoloTransizione itgt join itgt.csCfgItTransizione itt where itgt.nomeRuolo LIKE '%'|| UPPER(:nomeRuolo) ||'%' and itt.csCfgItStatoDa.id = :idStato

named-query.name: CsCfgAttrOption.findAttrOptionByCfgAttr
named-query.query: select op from CsCfgAttrOption op where op.csCfgAttr.id = :idCfgAttr order by op.ordine

named-query.name: CsAlert.getAlertByIdCasoTipo
named-query.query: select a from CsAlert a where a.csACaso.id = :idCaso and tipo = :tipo

named-query.name: CsAlert.getAlertVisibiliByIdCasoTipoOpeTo
named-query.query: select a from CsAlert a where a.csACaso.id = :idCaso and tipo = :tipo and a.csOpSettore2.id = :opSettoreTo and a.visibile = true

named-query.name: CsAlert.findAlertEmail
named-query.query: select a from CsAlert a where a.emailInviata = false order by a.dtIns

named-query.name: CsAlertConfig.getAlertConfigByTipo
named-query.query: select a from CsAlertConfig a where a.tipo = :tipo

named-query.name: CsOOpsettoreAlertConfig.find
named-query.query: select a from CsOOpsettoreAlertConfig a where a.id.tipoCod = :tipoCod and a.id.operatoreSettoreId = :opSettoreId

named-query.name: CsOOpsettoreAlertConfig.findByOpSettore
named-query.query: select distinct a.id.tipoCod from CsOOpsettoreAlertConfig a where a.id.operatoreSettoreId = :opSettoreId and a.flgNotifica=1

named-query.name: CsOOpSettoreAuthDownload.findByOpSettore
named-query.query: select distinct a.id.sottocartellaDocId from CsOOpsettoreAuthDownload a where a.id.operatoreSettoreId = :opSettoreId

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findOperatoriByTipoId
named-query.query: select oto from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto where oto.csTbTipoOperatore.id = :id and oto.csTbTipoOperatore.abilitato = '1' order by oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.cognome, oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.nome, oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.username

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findOperatoriByTipoIdSettore
named-query.query: select oto from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto where oto.csTbTipoOperatore.id = :idTipo and oto.csTbTipoOperatore.abilitato = '1' and oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOSettore.id = :idSettore order by oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.cognome, oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.nome, oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.username

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findOperatoriByTipoDescrizione
named-query.query: select oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto where oto.csTbTipoOperatore.descrizione = :descrizione and oto.csTbTipoOperatore.abilitato = '1' order by oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.username

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findOperatoriByCatSocialeOrg
named-query.query: select DISTINCT o from CsRelSettoreCatsoc sc, CsOOperatoreSettore os inner join os.csOOperatore o inner join fetch o.csOOperatoreAnagrafica ana where sc.id.settoreId = os.csOSettore.id and sc.id.categoriaSocialeId = :idCatSociale and sc.csOSettore.csOOrganizzazione.codRouting=:codRouting order by o.username

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore.findTipiOperatoreByOperatoreSettore
named-query.query: select distinct oto.csTbTipoOperatore.descrizione from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto where oto.csOOperatoreSettore.id IN (:idOperatoreSettore) order by oto.csTbTipoOperatore.descrizione

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findTipoByOperatoreSettore
named-query.query: select oto from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto where oto.csOOperatoreSettore.id = :idOpSet and oto.dataFineApp >= :dataFineApp and oto.csTbTipoOperatore.abilitato = '1' order by oto.csTbTipoOperatore.descrizione

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore.eliminaTipoOperatoreById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto WHERE oto.id = :id

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore.eliminaTipoOperatoreByIdOperatoreSettore
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto WHERE oto.csOOperatoreSettore.id = :idOpSet

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.eliminaCasoOpeTipoOpeByIdOperatoreSettore
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsACasoOpeTipoOpe coto WHERE coto.operatoreTipoOperatoreId IN (SELECT oto.id FROM CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto WHERE oto.csOOperatoreSettore.id = :idOpSet)

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.getOperatoreByUsername
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatore it left join fetch it.csOOperatoreAnagrafica ana where UPPER(it.username) = UPPER(:username)

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreBASIC.getOperatoreBASICByUserName
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreBASIC it left join fetch it.csOOperatoreAnagrafica ana where UPPER(it.username) = UPPER(:username)

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.getOperatoreById
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatore it left join fetch it.csOOperatoreAnagrafica ana where it.id = :idOp

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.getOperatoreSettoreById
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreSettore it where it.csOOperatore.id = :idOp and it.dataFineApp >= :date and it.csOSettore.id = :idSettore

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findAll
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreSettore it

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findOperatoreSettoreAnagraficaBySettore
named-query.query: select distinct it.id, op.id, oana, nvl(it.dataInizioApp, TO_DATE('01/01/0001','dd/MM/yyyy')) as dataInizioApp, nvl(it.dataFineApp, TO_DATE('31/12/9999','dd/MM/yyyy')) as dataFineApp, op.abilitato from CsOOperatoreSettore it inner join it.csOOperatore op left join op.csOOperatoreAnagrafica oana where it.csOSettore.id = :idSettore

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findRespSettoreAttivo
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreSettore it where it.csOSettore.id = :idSettore and UPPER(it.amGroup) like ('%'||UPPER(:gruppo)||'%') and it.dataFineApp is not null and sysdate between it.dataInizioApp and it.dataFineApp and it.csOOperatore.abilitato = 1 order by it.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.cognome

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findOperatoreIdAnagraficaBySettore
named-query.query: select it.csOOperatore.id, it.dataInizioApp, it.dataFineApp, it.csOOperatore.abilitato, it.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica from CsOOperatoreSettore it where it.csOSettore.id = :idSettore order by it.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.cognome

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findOperatoreSettoreByOperatore
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreSettore it where it.csOOperatore.id = :idOp and it.dataFineApp >= :date order by it.csOSettore.csOOrganizzazione.id, it.csOSettore.id

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findOperatoreSettoreByUsername
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreSettore it where it.csOOperatore.username = :username and it.dataFineApp >= :date order by it.csOSettore.csOOrganizzazione.id, it.csOSettore.id

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.eliminaOperatoreSettoreById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsOOperatoreSettore os WHERE os.id = :id

named-query.name: CsOOpsettoreAlertConfig.eliminaByIdOperatoreSettore
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsOOpsettoreAlertConfig os WHERE os.id.operatoreSettoreId = :idOpSettore

named-query.name: CsOOpsettoreAlertConfig.setEmailByIdOperatoreSettore
named-query.query: UPDATE CsOOpsettoreAlertConfig os SET os.flgEmail = :abilita WHERE os.id.operatoreSettoreId = :idOpSettore

named-query.name: CsOSettore.findAll
named-query.query: select it from CsOSettore it INNER JOIN FETCH it.csOOrganizzazione org left join fetch it.csAAnaIndirizzo ind order by it.nOrd, org.nome, it.nome

named-query.name: CsOSettore.findSettoriInvianteInviatoInCarico
named-query.query: select it from CsOSettore it INNER JOIN FETCH it.csOOrganizzazione org left join fetch it.csAAnaIndirizzo ind where (it.flgInviante = 1 or it.flgInviatoA = 1 or it.flgInCaricoA = 1) order by it.nOrd, org.nome, it.nome

named-query.name: CsOSettore.findSettoreBASICByOrganizzazione
named-query.query: select it from CsOSettoreBASIC it left join fetch it.csAAnaIndirizzo ind where it.csOOrganizzazioneId = :idOrganizzazione order by it.nOrd, it.nome

named-query.name: CsOSettore.findSettoreBASICSecondoLivelloByOrganizzazione
named-query.query: select it from CsOSettoreBASIC it left join fetch it.csAAnaIndirizzo ind where it.csOOrganizzazioneId = :idOrganizzazione and it.csTbSecondoLivello is not null order by it.nOrd, it.nome

named-query.name: CsOSettore.findSettoreBASICSenzaSecondoLivelloByOrganizzazione
named-query.query: select it from CsOSettoreBASIC it left join fetch it.csAAnaIndirizzo ind where it.csOOrganizzazioneId = :idOrganizzazione and it.csTbSecondoLivello is null order by it.nOrd, it.nome

named-query.name: CsOOrganizzazione.findAll
named-query.query: select it from CsOOrganizzazione it order by it.nome

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppoGit.getFamiglieGruppoGitByProvenienza
named-query.query: select it from CsAFamigliaGruppoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where it.csASoggetto.csAAnagrafica.idOrigWs LIKE :provenienza ||'@%'

named-query.name: CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit.getAnagraficaCasoGitByProvenienza
named-query.query: select it from CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where it.csASoggetto.csAAnagrafica.idOrigWs LIKE :provenienza ||'@%'

named-query.name: CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit.getAnagraficaSoggettoGitByEscudiProvenienzaId
named-query.query: select it from CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where (it.csASoggetto.csAAnagrafica.idOrigWs IS NULL) AND LENGTH(it.csASoggetto.csAAnagrafica.cf) = 16 order by it.id desc

named-query.name: CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit.getAnagraficaCasoGitByIdSoggetto
named-query.query: select it from CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggettoAnagrafica

named-query.name: CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit.getAnagraficheAggiornate
named-query.query: select distinct it from CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where it.flgSegnalazione = true

named-query.name: CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit.getAnagraficaAggiornataBySoggId
named-query.query: select it from CsAComponenteAnagCasoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csAAnagrafica ana inner join fetch s.csACaso c where s.anagraficaId = :idSoggettoAnagrafica and it.segnalazione is not null and it.segnalazione != '-' and (it.dtMod is not null and it.dtMod > :dtVal)

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppoGit.getFamigliaGruppoGitBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsAFamigliaGruppoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where it.csASoggetto.id = :idSoggetto

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppoGit.getFamigliaGruppoGitAggiornate
named-query.query: select distinct it from CsAFamigliaGruppoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where it.flgSegnalazione = '1'

named-query.name: CsAComponenteGit.deleteByIds
named-query.query: delete from CsAComponenteGit where id IN (:ids)

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getFamigliaGruppoById
named-query.query: select it from CsAFamigliaGruppo it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c left join fetch it.csAComponentes comps where it.id = :id

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getFamigliaGruppoBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsAFamigliaGruppo it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, it.dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getIdsFamigliaGruppoBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select distinct fg.id from CsAFamigliaGruppo fg where fg.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :anagraficaId

named-query.name: CsAComponente.getComponentiAllaDataBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select c from CsAComponente c inner join fetch c.csAAnagrafica ana left join fetch c.csTbContatto contatto left join fetch c.csTbDisponibilita disponibilita left join fetch c.csTbPotesta potesta left join fetch c.csTbTipoRapportoCon rapporto left join fetch c.csAFamigliaGruppo fg left join fetch fg.csASoggetto sogg left join fetch sogg.csAAnagrafica anaCaso where sogg.id = :idSoggetto and :dtVal between fg.dataInizioApp and fg.dataFineApp

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getAnaSoggettoFamiglieGruppo
named-query.query: select distinct fg.csASoggetto from CsAFamigliaGruppo fg JOIN FETCH fg.csASoggetto.csACaso where fg.id IN :famigliaIds

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getAnaComponentiGiaFamigliariSoggettoCf
named-query.query: select comp from CsAFamigliaGruppo fg inner join fg.csAComponentes comp where fg.id IN :famigliaIds and comp.csAAnagrafica.cf!= :cfSoggetto order by comp.csAAnagrafica.cognome, comp.csAAnagrafica.nome, comp.id desc

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.eliminaFamigliaGruppoById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsAFamigliaGruppo cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsAComponente.eliminaComponenteById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsAComponente cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsAComponente.getComponenteNotInByFamigliaGruppoId
named-query.query: SELECT cs FROM CsAComponente cs WHERE cs.csAFamigliaGruppo.id = :id AND cs.id NOT IN (:listaId)

named-query.name: CsADisabilita.getDisabilitaBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsADisabilita it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADisabilita.eliminaDisabilitaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsADisabilita cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsADatiSociali.getSocialiBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsADatiSociali it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADatiSociali.getSocialiBySoggettoCf
named-query.query: select it from CsADatiSociali it where it.csASoggetto.csAAnagrafica.cf = :cfSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADatiSociali.getSocialiAttiviBySoggettoCf
named-query.query: select it from CsADatiSociali it where it.csASoggetto.csAAnagrafica.cf = :cfSoggetto and sysdate between it.dataInizioApp and it.dataFineApp order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADatiSociali.eliminaSocialiById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsADatiSociali cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsExtraFseSiru.eliminaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsExtraFseSiru s WHERE s.id = :id

named-query.name: CsExtraFseDatiLavoro.eliminaByIdMast
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsExtraFseDatiLavoro s WHERE s.master.id = :id

named-query.name: CsExtraFseMast.eliminaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsExtraFseMast mast WHERE mast.id = :id

named-query.name: CsExtraFseDatiLavoro.findDatiPorUdcBySchedaId
named-query.query: SELECT m from CsExtraFseDatiLavoro m WHERE m.master.tipo = :tipo and m.master.schedaId = :schedaId ORDER BY m.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsADatiInvalidita.getInvaliditaBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsADatiInvalidita it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADatiInvalidita.getInvaliditaBySoggettoIdAllaData
named-query.query: select it from CsADatiInvalidita it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto and :dtRif between it.dataInizioApp and it.dataFineApp order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADatiInvalidita.eliminaInvaliditaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsADatiInvalidita cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsATribunale.getTribunaleBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsATribunale it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsATribunale.eliminaTribunaleById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsATribunale cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsDDiario.getDiarioByCasoId
named-query.query: select it from CsDDiario it where it.csACaso.id = :casoId

named-query.name: CsDDiario.getDiarioBySchedaId
named-query.query: select it from CsDDiario it where it.schedaId = :schedaId

named-query.name: CsDDiario.deleteDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDDiario d where d.id = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDClob.delete
named-query.query: delete from CsDClob d where d.id = :idClob

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.delete
named-query.query: delete from CsDValutazione d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDColloquioBASIC.findByCasoId
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CsDColloquioBASIC c INNER JOIN FETCH c.csDDiario d INNER JOIN FETCH d.csACaso cs INNER JOIN FETCH cs.csASoggetto sg LEFT JOIN FETCH c.csCDiarioConchi LEFT JOIN FETCH c.csCDiarioDove LEFT JOIN FETCH c.csCTipoColloquio WHERE cs.id=:casoId ORDER BY d.dtAmministrativa desc, nvl(d.dtMod, d.dtIns) desc

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findAllSchedeValutazione
named-query.query: select v from CsDValutazione v inner join fetch v.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.csTbTipoDiario.id= :tipoDiarioId

named-query.name: CsCTipoColloquio.findAllTipoColloquios
named-query.query: select it from CsCTipoColloquio it order by it.descrizione

named-query.name: CsCDiarioDove.findAllDiarioDoves
named-query.query: select it from CsCDiarioDove it order by it.descrizione

named-query.name: CsCDiarioConchi.findAllDiarioConchis
named-query.query: select it from CsCDiarioConchi it order by it.descrizione

named-query.name: CsCDiarioConchi.findByIds
named-query.query: select it from CsCDiarioConchi it where it.id in :listaIds order by it.descrizione

named-query.name: CsDDiarioDoc.findDiarioDocById
named-query.query: select cs from CsDDiarioDoc cs where cs.id.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDDiarioDoc.deleteDiarioDocByIdDocumento
named-query.query: delete from CsDDiarioDoc d where d.id.documentoId = :idDocumento

named-query.name: CsDPai.deletePAIByIdDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDPai d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDPai.findPaiByCaso
named-query.query: select r from CsDPai r inner join fetch r.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by d.dtAmministrativa desc

named-query.name: CsDPai.findPaiAperti
named-query.query: select r from CsDPai r where (r.csDDiario.dtChiusuraDa IS NULL OR r.csDDiario.dtChiusuraDa >= sysdate)

named-query.name: CsDPai.findSintesiById
named-query.query: select distinct r.csTbTipoPai.descrizione, r.csDDiario.dtAttivazioneDa , r.csDDiario.dtChiusuraDa from CsDPai r where r.diarioId = :diarioId

named-query.name: CsPaiMastSogg.findSoggettiPaiSenzCaso
named-query.query: select pms from CsPaiMastSogg pms where pms.casoId is null and exists (select 1 from CsASoggettoLAZY s where upper(s.csAAnagrafica.cf) = upper(pms.cf)) order by pms.cf

named-query.name: CsDRelazione.findByIds
named-query.query: select r from CsDRelazione r inner join fetch r.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.id in :listaId order by d.dtAmministrativa desc

named-query.name: CsDRelazione.findRelazioniByCaso
named-query.query: select r from CsDRelazione r inner join fetch r.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by d.dtAmministrativa desc

named-query.name: CsDRelazione.findRelazioniSintesiByCaso
named-query.query: select distinct r.diarioId, r.csDDiario.dtAmministrativa, r.situazioneAmb, r.situazioneParentale, r.situazioneSanitaria, r.proposta, r.macroAttivita.descrizione, r.microAttivita.descrizione, r.microAttivita.flagTipoForm from CsDRelazione r where r.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by r.csDDiario.dtAmministrativa desc

named-query.name: CsDRelazione.findRelazioniInScadenza
named-query.query: select r from CsDRelazione r inner join fetch r.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where r.dataProssimaRelazioneDal<= sysdate and not exists (select 1 from CsDDiario d1 where d1.csTbTipoDiario.id=6 and d.csACaso.id=d1.csACaso.id and r.dataProssimaRelazioneDal<= d1.dtAmministrativa) order by d.csACaso.id, d.dtAmministrativa desc, d.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsLoadDocumento.findLoadDocumentoByDiarioId
named-query.query: select d.csLoadDocumento from CsDDiarioDoc d where d.csDDIario.id = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDDocIndividuale.deleteDocIndividualeByIdDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDDocIndividuale d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsFlgIntervento.getListaInterventiByIdCaso
named-query.query: select distinct i from CsIIntervento i left join fetch i.csFlgInterventos f left join fetch f.csDDiario d left join fetch d.csACaso c left join fetch c.csASoggetto s left join fetch s.csAAnagrafica anac left join fetch i.csIQuota q left join fetch i.csIInterventoPr pr left join fetch pr.csIInterventoPrFse fse left join fetch pr.csIInterventoPrFseSiru siru left join fetch i.csRelSettCsocTipoInter rel left join fetch rel.csRelCatsocTipoInter csocinter left join fetch rel.csRelSettoreCatsoc setcsoc left join fetch i.csIInterventoCustom custom where c.id=:casoId order by i.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsFlgIntervento.countInterventiByIdCaso
named-query.query: select count(distinct f.csIIntervento.id) from CsFlgIntervento f where f.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:casoId

named-query.name: CsACasoAccessoFascicolo.findByCasoId
named-query.query: select d from CsACasoAccessoFascicolo d left join fetch d.csOSettore s left join fetch d.csOOrganizzazione o left join fetch s.csTbSecondoLivello tb left join fetch s.csAAnaIndirizzo ind where d.casoId = :casoId order by d.dataInizioSys

named-query.name: CsACasoAccessoFascicolo.findAttualiBySettoreOrganizzazione
named-query.query: select d from CsACasoAccessoFascicolo d where d.idOrganizzazione = :idOrganizzazione and d.idSettore = :idSettore and sysdate between d.dataInizioApp and d.dataFineApp order by d.dataInizioSys

named-query.name: CsACasoAccessoFascicolo.findAttualiByCasoSettoreOrganizzazione
named-query.query: select d from CsACasoAccessoFascicolo d where d.casoId = :idCaso and d.idOrganizzazione = :idOrganizzazione and d.idSettore = :idSettore and sysdate between d.dataInizioApp and d.dataFineApp order by d.dataInizioApp

named-query.name: CsACasoAccessoFascicolo.deleteByCasoId
named-query.query: delete from CsACasoAccessoFascicolo d where d.casoId = :casoId

named-query.name: CsFlgIntervento.deleteById
named-query.query: delete from CsFlgIntervento d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsIIntervento.deleteById
named-query.query: delete from CsIIntervento d where d.id = :idIntervento

named-query.name: CsLoadDocumento.deleteLoadDocumentoById
named-query.query: delete from CsLoadDocumento d where d.id = :id

named-query.name: CsSsSchedaSegr.findSchedaSegrBySchedaIdProvenienza
named-query.query: select s from CsSsSchedaSegr s where s.schedaId = :schedaId and s.provenienza = :provenienza

named-query.name: CsSsSchedaSegr.findByIdAnagraficaStato
named-query.query: select s from CsSsSchedaSegr s left join fetch s.csASoggetto sogg left join fetch s.tbProvenienza prov where sogg.anagraficaId = :idAnagrafica and s.stato=:stato order by s.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsSsSchedaSegr.findByIdAnagraficaNotSS
named-query.query: select s from CsSsSchedaSegr s where s.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idAnagrafica and s.provenienza != :provenienza

named-query.name: CsSchedeAltraProvenienza.findVistaCasiAltriBySchedaIdProvenienza
named-query.query: select s from CsSchedeAltraProvenienza s where s.idSchedaSegr = :idSchedaSegr and s.provenienza = :provenienza

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findValutazioneById
named-query.query: select v from CsDValutazione v where v.id = :idValutazione

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findValutazioneBySoggetto
named-query.query: SELECT v FROM CsDValutazione v inner join fetch v.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os WHERE d.csACaso.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :anagraficaId AND d.csTbTipoDiario.id = :tipoDiarioId ORDER BY d.dtAmministrativa DESC

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findValutazioneByUdcId
named-query.query: SELECT v FROM CsDValutazione v WHERE v.csDDiario.schedaId = :schedaId AND v.csDDiario.csTbTipoDiario.id IN (:tipoDiarioId) ORDER BY v.csDDiario.dtAmministrativa DESC

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findClobById
named-query.query: select clb from CsDClob clb where clb.id = :idClob

named-query.name: CsDScuola.findScuolaByCaso
named-query.query: select i.diarioId,i.grado, i.note, i.nome, anno.descrizione, tipo.descrizione, nvl(i.csDDiario.dtMod,i.csDDiario.dtIns), nvl(i.csDDiario.usrMod, i.csDDiario.userIns), scuola, i.csDDiario.visSecondoLivello, i.csDDiario.csOOperatoreSettore.csOSettore.id from CsDScuola i left join i.csTbAnnoScolastico anno left join i.csTbTipoScuola tipo left join i.csTbScuola scuola where i.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by anno.ordine desc

named-query.name: CsDScuola.deleteScuolaByIdDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDScuola d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDIsee.findIseeByCaso
named-query.query: select i from CsDIsee i INNER JOIN FETCH i.tipoIsee tipo where i.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by i.annoRif, tipo.descrizione

named-query.name: CsDIsee.findIseeAttiveByCaso
named-query.query: select i from CsDIsee i INNER JOIN FETCH i.tipoIsee tipo where i.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:idCaso and i.csDDiario.dtChiusuraDa > sysdate order by i.annoRif, tipo.descrizione

named-query.name: CsDIsee.findSintesiByCaso
named-query.query: select i.diarioId, i.annoRif, i.tipoIsee.descrizione from CsDIsee i where i.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by i.annoRif, i.tipoIsee.descrizione

named-query.name: CsDIsee.deleteIseeByIdDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDIsee d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDSina.deleteSinaEsegById
named-query.query: delete from CsDSinaEseg sinaEseg where sinaEseg.csDSina.id = :idSina

named-query.name: CsDSina.getSinaByDiarioId
named-query.query: select sina from CsDSina sina LEFT JOIN sina.csDSinaEseg sinaEsegs LEFT JOIN sinaEsegs.csTbSinaDomanda domanda LEFT JOIN sinaEsegs.csTbSinaRisposta risposta where sina.csDDiario.id = :idDiario ORDER BY domanda.id asc

named-query.name: CsDSina.getSinaEsegBySinaId
named-query.query: select sinaEseg from CsDSinaEseg sinaEseg where sinaEseg.csDSina.id = :idSina

named-query.name: CsDSinaLIGHT.getSinaByMastId
named-query.query: select sinaEseg from CsDSinaLIGHT sinaEseg where sinaEseg.interventoEsegMastId in (:ids) and nvl(sinaEseg.data,TO_DATE('31/12/9999','dd/MM/yyyy')) = (select max(nvl(b.data,TO_DATE('31/12/9999','dd/MM/yyyy'))) from CsDSinaLIGHT b where b.interventoEsegMastId = sinaEseg.interventoEsegMastId)

named-query.name: CsTbTipoAbitazione.findAll
named-query.query: select tipoab from CsTbTipoAbitazione tipoab order by tipoab.id

named-query.name: CsTbAbitTitoloGodimento.findAll
named-query.query: select titolo from CsTbAbitTitoloGodimento titolo order by titolo.id

named-query.name: CsDSina.getSinaById
named-query.query: select sina from CsDSina sina LEFT JOIN sina.csDSinaEseg sinaEsegs LEFT JOIN sinaEsegs.csTbSinaDomanda domanda LEFT JOIN sinaEsegs.csTbSinaRisposta risposta where sina.id = :idSina ORDER BY domanda.id asc

named-query.name: CsDSina.getSinaByInterventoEsegMastId
named-query.query: select sina from CsDSina sina where sina.csIInterventoEsegMast.id = :interventoEsegMastId

named-query.name: CsDSina.setNullMastId
named-query.query: UPDATE CsDSina SET csIInterventoEsegMast = null WHERE id = :id

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMast.setNullDiarioPaiId
named-query.query: UPDATE CsIInterventoEsegMast SET diarioPaiId = null WHERE id = :id

named-query.name: CsDSina.deleteSinaById
named-query.query: delete from CsDSina sina where sina.id = :idSina

named-query.name: CsDSina.findSinaByMastId
named-query.query: select sina from CsDSina sina where sina.csIInterventoEsegMast.id = :mastId order by sina.data desc

named-query.name: CsDSina.findSinaByCaso
named-query.query: select sina from CsDSina sina where sina.csDDiario.csACaso.id = :casoId order by sina.data desc

named-query.name: CsDSina.findMinDateCollegatiByMastId
named-query.query: select sina.csDDiario.dtAmministrativa from CsDSina sina where sina.csIInterventoEsegMast.id = :mastId order by sina.csDDiario.dtAmministrativa asc

named-query.name: CsDSina.findSinaCollegabiliByCF
named-query.query: select sina from CsDSina sina, CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg sogg where sina.csIInterventoEsegMast.id = sogg.master.id and sina.csIInterventoEsegMast.id != :mastId and UPPER(sogg.id.cf) = UPPER(:cf) and sogg.riferimento = 1 order by sina.data desc

named-query.name: CsRelSettCsocTipoInter.findTipiInterventoSettCatsoc
named-query.query: select distinct rel.csRelCatsocTipoInter.csCTipoIntervento from CsRelSettCsocTipoInter rel where rel.abilitato= 1 and rel.csRelCatsocTipoInter.csCTipoIntervento.abilitato='1' and rel.id.scsSettoreId = :idSettore and rel.id.scsCategoriaSocialeId IN (:idCatsoc)

named-query.name: CsRelCatsocTipoInter.findRelCatsocTipointerByCatSoc

named-query.name: CsRelCatsocTipoInter.eliminaRelCatsocTipointerByIds
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsRelCatsocTipoInter rel where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc and rel.id.tipoInterventoId = :idTipointer

named-query.name: CsRelSettoreCatsoc.findRelSettoreCatsocByCatSoc
named-query.query: select DISTINCT rel from CsRelSettoreCatsoc rel where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc

named-query.name: CsRelSettoreCatsoc.findRelSettoreCatsocBySettore
named-query.query: select DISTINCT rel, csoc.nOrd from CsRelSettoreCatsoc rel inner join fetch rel.csCCategoriaSociale csoc where rel.id.settoreId = :idSettore order by csoc.nOrd

named-query.name: CsRelSettoreCatsoc.eliminaRelSettoreCatsocByIds
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsRelSettoreCatsoc rel where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc and rel.id.settoreId = :idSettore

named-query.name: CsRelSettCsocTipoInter.findRelSettCatsocTipoInterByCatSoc
named-query.query: select DISTINCT rel from CsRelSettCsocTipoInter rel where rel.id.scsCategoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc order by rel.id.scsSettoreId, rel.id.cstiTipoInterventoId

named-query.name: CsRelSettCsocTipoInter.eliminaRelSettoreCsocTipointerByIds
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsRelSettCsocTipoInter rel where rel.id.scsCategoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc and rel.id.scsSettoreId = :idSettore and rel.id.cstiTipoInterventoId = :idTipointer

named-query.name: CsRelRelazioneTipoint.deleteByIdRelazione
named-query.query: delete from CsRelRelazioneTipoint cs where cs.id.relazioneDiarioId = :idRelazione

named-query.name: CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva.findRelSettCatsocEsclusivaByTipoDiarioId
named-query.query: select rel from CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva rel where rel.id.tipoDiarioId = :tipoDiarioId and rel.abilitato = '1'

named-query.name: CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva.findRelSettCatsocEsclusivaByCatSoc
named-query.query: select rel from CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva rel where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :catSocId order by rel.id.settoreId, rel.id.tipoDiarioId

named-query.name: CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva.findRelSettCatsocEsclusivaByIds
named-query.query: select rel from CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva rel where rel.id.tipoDiarioId = :tipoDiarioId and rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :categoriaSocialeId and rel.id.settoreId = :settoreId and rel.abilitato = '1'

named-query.name: CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva.deleteRelSettCatsocEsclusivaByIds
named-query.query: delete from CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva rel where rel.id.tipoDiarioId = :tipoDiarioId and rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :categoriaSocialeId and rel.id.settoreId = :settoreId

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.deleteByCasoId
named-query.query: delete from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe d where d.casoId = :casoId

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe2.deleteOpeByCasoId
named-query.query: delete from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe2 d where d.casoId = :casoId

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe2.findOpeByCasoId
named-query.query: select d from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe2 d where d.casoId = :casoId order by d.dataInizioSys

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.findByCasoId
named-query.query: select d from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe d left join fetch d.csOOperatoreTipoOperatore tipo left join fetch tipo.csOOperatoreSettore os left join fetch os.csOOperatore o left join fetch os.csOSettore s left join fetch s.csOOrganizzazione org left join fetch o.csOOperatoreAnagrafica ana where d.casoId = :casoId order by d.dataInizioApp

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.findResponsabileByCaso
named-query.query: select cs from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe cs where cs.casoId = :casoId and cs.flagResponsabile = 1

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.findOpSettoreResponsabileByCaso
named-query.query: select os from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe cs left join cs.csOOperatoreTipoOperatore tipo left join tipo.csOOperatoreSettore os left join fetch os.csOOperatore o left join fetch os.csOSettore s left join fetch s.csOOrganizzazione org left join fetch o.csOOperatoreAnagrafica ana left join fetch os.tipoOperatore tipoOp left join fetch tipoOp.csTbTipoOperatore tb where cs.casoId = :casoId and cs.flagResponsabile = 1

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreBASIC.findResponsabileBASICByCaso
named-query.query: select cs.csOOperatoreTipoOperatoreBASIC.csOOperatoreSettoreBASIC.csOOperatoreBASIC from CsACasoOpeTipoOpeBASIC cs left join fetch cs.csOOperatoreTipoOperatoreBASIC.csOOperatoreSettoreBASIC.csOOperatoreBASIC.csOOperatoreAnagrafica where cs.casoId = :casoId and cs.flagResponsabile = 1 order by cs.dataFineApp desc

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore.findOpTipoOpByOpSettore
named-query.query: select cs from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore cs where cs.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.id = :operatoreId and cs.csOOperatoreSettore.csOSettore.id = :settoreId

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.findCasoOpeTipoOpeByCasoOpSettore
named-query.query: select cs from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe cs where cs.csOOperatoreTipoOperatore.csOOperatoreSettore.id = :opSettoreId and cs.casoId = :casoId

named-query.name: CsCfgParametri.findParamBySezioneChiave
named-query.query: select cs from CsCfgParametri cs where cs.id.sezione = :sezione and cs.id.chiave = :chiave

named-query.name: CsCfgIntEsegStato.findIntEsegStatoByTipiStatoOrBypass
named-query.query: select c.csCfgIntEsegStato from CsCfgIntEsegStatoInt c where c.csCfgIntervEseg.tipoIntervento.id = :tipoInterventoId AND (c.bypassTipoStato=true OR c.csCfgIntEsegStato.tipo IN (:tipiStato)) order by c.csCfgIntEsegStato.ordine

named-query.name: CsCfgIntEseg.findConfigIntErogByTipoIntervento
named-query.query: select c from CsCfgIntEsegStatoInt c LEFT JOIN FETCH c.csCfgIntEsegStato stato where c.csCfgIntervEseg.tipoIntervento.id = :tipoInterventoId

named-query.name: CsCfgAttrUnitaMisura.findByAttributoUM
named-query.query: select c from CsCfgAttrUnitaMisura c where c.csCfgAttributo.id = :idAttributo and c.csTbUnitaMisura.id = :idUnitaMisura

named-query.name: CsCfgAttrUnitaMisura.findByAttributoNullUM
named-query.query: select c from CsCfgAttrUnitaMisura c where c.csCfgAttributo.id = :idAttributo and c.csTbUnitaMisura is null

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMast.findByInterventoId

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMast.findIdByInterventoId
named-query.query: select mast.id from CsIInterventoEsegMast mast where mast.interventoProgrammatoId = :interventoId

named-query.name: CsIPs.findByInterventoId
named-query.query: select ps from CsIPs ps where ps.csIInterventoEsegMast.interventoProgrammatoId = :interventoId

named-query.name: CsIInterventoPr.findProgettoByMasterId

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg.findBeneficiariByMasterId
named-query.query: select sogg from CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg sogg where sogg.master.id = :masterId order by sogg.riferimento desc, sogg.cognome, sogg.nome

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg.findBeneficiariByCfAttivitaProgetto
named-query.query: select sogg from CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg sogg inner join fetch sogg.master sm inner join fetch sm.csIInterventoPr smIntPr inner join fetch smIntPr.csIInterventoPrFse where sogg.id.cf = :cf and sogg.riferimento = 1 and smIntPr.progettoAttivita.id = :attivitaId and smIntPr.progetto.id = :progettoId order by sogg.id.masterId desc

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg.findBeneficiariByCfSoggetto
named-query.query: select sogg from CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg sogg where sogg.id.cf = :cf and sogg.riferimento = 1 order by sogg.id.masterId desc

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEseg.findInterventoEsegByMasterId
named-query.query: select inteseg from CsIInterventoEseg inteseg left join fetch inteseg.csIValQuota q left join fetch inteseg.stato s left join fetch inteseg.csOOperatoreSettore op where inteseg.csIInterventoEsegMast.id = :masterId order by inteseg.dataEsecuzione desc, inteseg.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEseg.findSintesiInterventoEsegByInterventoId
named-query.query: select distinct inteseg.dataEsecuzione, inteseg.dataEsecuzioneA, inteseg.stato.nome, inteseg.dtIns from CsIInterventoEseg inteseg where inteseg.csIInterventoEsegMast.interventoProgrammatoId = :interventoId order by inteseg.dataEsecuzione desc, inteseg.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegValore.deletebyIdsIntervento
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIInterventoEsegValore cs WHERE cs.csIInterventoEseg.id IN (:listaIds)

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEseg.deleteByIds
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIInterventoEseg cs WHERE cs.id IN (:listaIds)

named-query.name: CsAAnagrafica.findAnagraficaByCf
named-query.query: select cs from CsAAnagrafica cs where cs.cf = :CodFisc

named-query.name: VGerrarchiaServizi.findAll
named-query.query: select s from VGerrarchiaServizi s

named-query.name: VGerrarchiaServizi.findAllNodesTipoIntervento
named-query.query: select s from VGerrarchiaServizi s where s.flagIntervento = '1'

named-query.name: VLineaFin.getLineeFinanziamentoByEnte
named-query.query: select a from VLineaFin a where a.belfiore = :belfiore order by a.descrizione

named-query.name: VInterventiRecenti.findAll

named-query.query: select DISTINCT a.idTipoInterventoCustom, a.descrizioneTipoInterventoCustom from VTipiInterventoUsati a where a.idTipoInterventoCustom is not null order by descrizioneTipoInterventoCustom

named-query.query: select c from CsCCategoriaSociale c where c.descrizione = :desc

named-query.name: CsIPsExport.findByCsIInterventoMastIdExported

named-query.query: select psex from CsIPsExport psex where psex.csIInterventoEseg.id= :intEsegId and psex.csIInterventoEsegMast.id= :intEsegMastId

named-query.name: CsIPsExport.deleteByIntEsegIdAndIntEsegMastId
named-query.query: delete from CsIPsExport psex where psex.csIInterventoEseg.id= :intEsegId and psex.csIInterventoEsegMast.id= :intEsegMastId and psex.flagEsportato = 0

named-query.name: CsIPsExportMast.deleteById
named-query.query: delete from CsIPsExportMast psexm where psexm.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIPsExportMast.findByIds
named-query.query: select psexm from CsIPsExportMast psexm where psexm.id IN :ids

named-query.name: CsIPsExportMast.findPsExportMastInPeriodo
named-query.query: select c from CsIPsExportMast c where TO_DATE(:dataDA,'dd/MM/yyyy')<=TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(dataInvio,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'dd/MM/yyyy') and TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(dataInvio,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'dd/MM/yyyy')<=TO_DATE(:dataA,'dd/MM/yyyy')

named-query.name: CsIPsExportMast.countProgressivoCsIPsExportMast

named-query.name: CsDExportSinba.countProgressivoCsDExportSinba
named-query.query: select COUNT(ex) from CsDExportSinba ex where ex.enteErogatore = :enteErogatore and ex.flusso = :flusso and ex.dtIns >= :dtInsStart and ex.dtIns < :dtInsEnd

named-query.query: delete from CsSsSchedaSegr s where s.schedaId = :schedaId and s.provenienza = :provenienza

named-query.query: select d from CsIRigaQuota d where d.csIQuota.id = :idQuota

named-query.name: CsIValQuota.delete
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIValQuota vq WHERE vq.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIRigaQuota.delete
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIRigaQuota rq WHERE rq.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIQuotaRipartiz.delete
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIQuotaRipartiz qr WHERE qr.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIPs.deleteByEsegMastId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIPs ps WHERE ps.csIInterventoEsegMast.id = :masterId

named-query.name: CsDRelazione.findLastRelazioneProblAperte
named-query.query: select r from CsDRelazione r inner join fetch r.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.csACaso.id= :idCaso AND r.flagRilevazioneProblematiche='1' order by d.dtAmministrativa desc

named-query.name: CsTbProgettoAltro.findProgettoAltroByDescrizione
named-query.query: select p from CsTbProgettoAltro p where p.abilitato = '1' and (upper(p.descrizione)) like ('%'||UPPER(:descrizione)||'%') order by p.descrizione

named-query.name: CsCfTemp.findByCfTempAndCf
named-query.query: select c from CsCfTemp c where c.cfTemp = :cfTemp and nvl(c.cf, 'null') = :cf

named-query.name: CsCfTemp.findByCfTemp
named-query.query: select c from CsCfTemp c where c.cfTemp = :cfTemp

named-query.name: CsCfTemp.findByAttribs
named-query.query: select c from CsCfTemp c where c.attributi = :attribs

named-query.name: CsCfgIntPrForm.find
named-query.query: select distinct c.rifFormInterventoPrDett from CsCfgIntPrForm c where (c.csCCategoriaSociale is null OR c.csCCategoriaSociale.id = :catSocialeId) and (c.csIIntervento is null OR c.csIIntervento.id = :tipoInterventoId) and (c.csIInterventoCustom is null OR c.csIInterventoCustom.id = :tipoInterventoCustomId) and c.ffProgettoDescrizione = :progetto and c.abilitato=1

named-query.name: ArBiInviante.findByInvianteIdAndNome
named-query.query: select c from ArBiInviante c where (c.idInviante = :idInviante and c.nomeInviante = :nomeInviante)

named-query.name: VServiziCustom.findAreaTInterventoById
named-query.query: SELECT s.interventoCustomId, s.areatId, s.areatDescrizione, s.codiceMemoAreat FROM VServiziCustom s WHERE s.interventoCustomId = :interventoCustomId group by s.interventoCustomId, s.areatId, s.areatDescrizione, s.codiceMemoAreat

named-query.name: VServiziCustom.findDettaglioInterventobyAreaTId
named-query.query: SELECT distinct s.interventoCustomId , s.interventoDescrizione FROM VServiziCustom s WHERE s.areatDescrizione IN (:areeId)

named-query.name: ArRelIntCustomIstat.findIstatByTipoInterventoId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ArRelIntCustomIstat a join a.csCInterventoCustom WHERE a.csCInterventoCustom.id = :tipoInterventoId

named-query.name: ArTClasse.findByCodiceMemo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ArTClasse a WHERE a.codiceMemo like ('%'||UPPER(:codiceMemo)||'%')

named-query.name: VServiziCustom.findAreaTInterventoByIdeAreaTSoggetto
named-query.query: SELECT s.interventoCustomId, s.areatId, s.areatDescrizione, s.codiceMemoAreat FROM VServiziCustom s WHERE s.interventoCustomId = :interventoCustomId and s.areatDescrizione IN (:areeId) group by s.interventoCustomId, s.areatId, s.areatDescrizione, s.codiceMemoAreat

named-query.name: CsMobileStaging.findRecord2Elab
named-query.query: select m from CsMobileStaging m where flgElab <> 1 order by dtSincro, tipo

named-query.name: ArTbPrestazioniInps.findByCodice
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ArTbPrestazioniInps a WHERE a.codice IN (:codice)

named-query.name: ArTbPrestazioniInps.findTipiInterventoInps
named-query.query: select DISTINCT a.codice, a.denominazione from ArTbPrestazioniInps a order by codice

named-query.name: CsIPsExport.revocByEsegMastId
named-query.query: UPDATE CsIPsExport SET flagEsportato = 0, dtRevocaExport = :dataRevoca WHERE csIInterventoEsegMast.id = :esegMastId

named-query.name: CsIPs.findCodiciPrestazione
named-query.query: select distinct csips.codPrestazione from CsIPs csips where csIInterventoEsegMast in (select sogg.master.id from CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg sogg, CsIInterventoEseg eseg,CsCfgIntEsegStato es where sogg.id.masterId = eseg.masterId and eseg.stato.id = es.id and sogg.id.cf = :cf and (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(eseg.dataEsecuzione,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'dd/MM/yyyy') >= TO_DATE(:dtIniRiferimento,'dd/MM/yyyy') and TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(eseg.dataEsecuzione,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'dd/MM/yyyy') <= TO_DATE(:dtFineRiferimento,'dd/MM/yyyy')) and es.tipo = :tipo) and codPrestazione is not null

named-query.name: ArTbPrestazioniInps.findPrestazioniByAreaId
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT pinps FROM VGerrarchiaServizi vgs, ArRelClassememoPresInps arrel, ArTbPrestazioniInps pinps WHERE vgs.flagIntervento = 1 AND vgs.areaTid = :area AND arrel.arTClasse.id = vgs.tClasseId AND pinps.codice = arrel.arTbPrestazioniInp.codice

named-query.name: CsDSinba.getListaSchedaSinbaByIdCaso
named-query.query: SELECT sinba FROM CsDSinba sinba WHERE sinba.csDValutazione.csDDiario.csACaso.id = :casoId

named-query.name: CsDSinba.getLastSchedaSinbaByIdCaso
named-query.query: SELECT sinba FROM CsDSinba sinba WHERE sinba.csDValutazione.csDDiario.csACaso.id = :casoId order by sinba.csDValutazione.csDDiario.dtAmministrativa DESC

named-query.name: CsIInterventoPr.eliminaProgetto
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIInterventoPr pr WHERE pr.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIInterventoPrFse.eliminaProgettoFse
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIInterventoPrFse prFse WHERE prFse.interventoPrId = :id

named-query.name: CsIInterventoPrFseSiru.eliminaProgettoFseSiru
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIInterventoPrFseSiru prFseSiru WHERE prFseSiru.interventoPrId = :id

named-query.name: VSsSchedeUdcDiff.verificaAggiornamenti
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM VSsSchedeUdcDiff s WHERE s.dt > (SELECT max(a.dtIns) FROM CsAlert a where a.tipo = 'MODUDC') OR (SELECT max(a.dtIns) FROM CsAlert a where a.tipo = 'MODUDC') IS NULL

named-query.name: CsAAnagraficaLog.findStorico
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM CsAAnagraficaLog s WHERE s.csAAnagrafica.id = :anagraficaId order by s.dataModifica DESC

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg.findInterventiByCasoId
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg s WHERE s.caso.id= :casoId

named-query.name: VMobiCasi.findCasiById
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM VMobiCasi s WHERE s.casoId= :casoId

named-query.name: VMobiIntErog.findIntEsegMastIdByCasoId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM VMobiIntErog a WHERE a.erSoggCasoId= :casoId and a.iId is null and a.erSoggCasoId IN (:idSettoreErogante)

named-query.name: VMobiIntErog.findIntEsegMastIdByCasoIdData
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM VMobiIntErog a WHERE a.erSoggCasoId= :casoId and a.flgFlagAttSospC = 'A' and (a.flgDtAttivazioneDa is null or a.flgDtAttivazioneDa < :dataValiditaErogazione ) and (a.flgDtAttivazioneA is null or a.flgDtAttivazioneA > :dataValiditaErogazione ) and a.erSoggCasoId IN (:idSettoreErogante)

named-query.name: CsOSettore.findSettoriById
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM CsOSettore s WHERE s.id IN (:listaIdSettori)

named-query.name: CsTbSinaRisposta.findRispostaByDomandaId
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CsTbSinaRisposta c WHERE c.csTbSinaDomanda.id = :idDomanda

named-query.name: CsPaiFaseChiusura.findPaiFaseChiusuraByTipoPaiId
named-query.query: select a from CsPaiFaseChiusura a where a.id.tipoPai = :idTipoPai

named-query.name: CsOSettore.findPerRiunione
named-query.query: select it from CsOSettore it WHERE it.flgRiunioneCon = 1

named-query.name: CsRelSettoreStruttura.findSettoreByIdStruttura
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM CsRelSettoreStruttura s WHERE s.idStruttura = :idStruttura

named-query.name: CsRelSettoreStruttura.findSettoreByStruttura
named-query.query: SELECT cos FROM CsOSettore cos, CsRelSettoreStruttura crss WHERE cos.id = crss.idSettore and crss.idStruttura = :idStruttura

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findOperatoreSettoreByCodStruttura
named-query.query: select DISTINCT os from CsOOperatoreSettore os where os.csOSettore.csTbSecondoLivello.descrizione = :tipo2livello and os.csOSettore.csOOrganizzazione.codRouting=:codRouting

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findOperatoreSettore2LivByIdOperatore
named-query.query: select os from CsOOperatoreSettore os where os.csOSettore.csTbSecondoLivello.descrizione = :tipo2livello and os.csOSettore.csOOrganizzazione.codRouting=:codRouting and os.csOOperatore.id = :idOperatore and os.dataFineApp >= :dtRif

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findOperatoreSettore2LivByUsername
named-query.query: select os from CsOOperatoreSettore os where os.csOSettore.csTbSecondoLivello.descrizione = :tipo2livello and os.csOSettore.csOOrganizzazione.codRouting=:codRouting and os.csOOperatore.username = :username and os.dataFineApp >= :dtRif

named-query.name: InserimentoMinoreDaStruttura.findInsMinoriInZsDaStruttura
named-query.query: SELECT ins FROM InserimentoMinoreDaStruttura ins, CsOOrganizzazione o where ins.codRouting = o.codRouting and ins.stato = :statoI

named-query.name: CsPaiMastSogg.findSoggByDiarioId
named-query.query: select c from CsPaiMastSogg c where c.diarioId = :diarioId

named-native-query.name: VMobiCasi.findCasiByOperatoreBySoggettoNomeCognome
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM V_Mobi_Casi where caso_id in ( SELECT a.CASO_ID caso_id FROM V_MOBI_CASI a INNER JOIN CS_A_SOGGETTO sogg ON (a.CASO_ID=sogg.CASO_ID) INNER JOIN CS_a_dati_sociali ds ON (sogg.ANAGRAFICA_ID=ds.SOGGETTO_ANAGRAFICA_ID) left join V_Mobi_Int_Erog s on s.er_Sogg_Caso_Id=a.CASO_ID left join CS_IT_STEP d on (d.CASO_ID=a.CASO_ID and d.CFG_IT_STATO_ID =3) WHERE TO_CHAR(ds.DATA_FINE_APP,'YYYY') = '9999' and a.USERNAME = :username and a.SOGG_NOME = :nomeSoggetto and a.SOGG_COGNOME = :cognomeSoggetto and a.SETTORE_ID IN (:idSettoreErogante) group by a.CASO_ID having count(d.id) > 0)

named-native-query.name: VMobiCasi.findCasiByOperatoreBySoggettoCognome
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM V_Mobi_Casi where caso_id in ( SELECT a.CASO_ID caso_id FROM V_MOBI_CASI a INNER JOIN CS_A_SOGGETTO sogg ON (a.CASO_ID=sogg.CASO_ID) INNER JOIN CS_a_dati_sociali ds ON (sogg.ANAGRAFICA_ID=ds.SOGGETTO_ANAGRAFICA_ID) left join V_Mobi_Int_Erog s on s.er_Sogg_Caso_Id=a.CASO_ID left join CS_IT_STEP d on (d.CASO_ID=a.CASO_ID and d.CFG_IT_STATO_ID =3) WHERE TO_CHAR(ds.DATA_FINE_APP,'YYYY') = '9999' and a.USERNAME = :username and a.SOGG_COGNOME = :cognomeSoggetto and a.SETTORE_ID IN (:idSettoreErogante) group by a.CASO_ID having count(d.id) > 0)

named-native-query.name: VMobiCasi.findCasiByOperatoreBySoggettoNomeCognomeCF
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM V_Mobi_Casi where caso_id in ( SELECT a.CASO_ID caso_id FROM V_MOBI_CASI a INNER JOIN CS_A_SOGGETTO sogg ON (a.CASO_ID=sogg.CASO_ID) INNER JOIN CS_a_dati_sociali ds ON (sogg.ANAGRAFICA_ID=ds.SOGGETTO_ANAGRAFICA_ID) left join V_Mobi_Int_Erog s on s.er_Sogg_Caso_Id=a.CASO_ID left join CS_IT_STEP d on (d.CASO_ID=a.CASO_ID and d.CFG_IT_STATO_ID =3) WHERE TO_CHAR(ds.DATA_FINE_APP,'YYYY') = '9999' and ( REPLACE(LOWER(CONCAT(a.SOGG_COGNOME,a.SOGG_NOME)),' ','') = :stringaRicercaSogg or REPLACE(LOWER(CONCAT(a.SOGG_NOME,a.SOGG_COGNOME)),' ','') = :stringaRicercaSogg or REPLACE(LOWER(a.SOGG_COGNOME),' ','') = :stringaRicercaSogg or REPLACE(LOWER(a.SOGG_CF),' ','')= :stringaRicercaSogg) group by a.CASO_ID having count(d.id) > 0) and V_Mobi_Casi.USERNAME = :username and V_Mobi_Casi.SETTORE_ID IN (:idSettoreErogante)
